verses.label: NASB
verses.text: The first account I composed, Theophilus, about all that Jesus began to do and teach,

verses.label: LEB
verses.text: ï»¿I produced the former account, O Theophilus, about all that Jesus began to do and to teach,

verses.label: WEB
verses.text: The first book I wrote, Theophilus, concerned all that Jesus began both to do and to teach,

verses.label: NKJV
verses.text: The former account I made, O Theophilus, of all that Jesus began both to do and teach,

verses.label: NIV
verses.text: In my former book, Theophilus, I wrote about all that Jesus began to do and to teach

verses.label: NLT
verses.text: Dear Theophilus: In my first book I told you about everything Jesus began to do and teach

verses.label: BBE
verses.text: I have given an earlier account, O Theophilus, of all the things which Jesus did, and of his teaching from the first,
